PN Jaksel Gelar Sidang Ortu Murid Gugat SMA Gonzaga Hari Ini
04 Nov 2019, 06:32 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Istockphoto/Marilyn Nieves)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Sidang gugatan Yustina Supatmi, orang tua murid yang menggugat guru karena kecewa anaknya tidak naik kelas kepada SMA Kolese Gonzaga, Pejaten Barat, Jakarta Selatan akan digelar pagi ini, Senin (4/11) di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan.Humas PN Jaksel Achmad Guntur mengatakan agenda sidang dengan nomor perkara 833/Pdt.G/2019/PNJKT.SEL adalah pemanggilan pihak tergugat agar menghadiri sidang."Jam 10.00 WIB. Acaranya masih memanggil pihak [tergugat] karena sidang sebelumnya ada yang tidak hadir," kata Achmad melalui pesan singkat kepada CNNIndonesia.com, Minggu (3/11).Sebelumnya sidang pertama sudah digelar pada Senin (28/10) lalu. Namun sidang tersebut ditunda karena pihak tergugat tidak hadir.Yustina menggugat Kepala Sekolah SMA Kolese Gonzaga Paulus Andri Astanto, Wakil Kepala Sekolah Bidang Kurikulum Himawan Santanu, Wakil Kepala Sekolah Bidang Kesiswaan Gerardus Hadian Panamokta, dan guru Sosiologi Kelas XI Agus Dewa Irianto.Selain itu Yustina turut menggugat Kepala Dinas Pendidikan Menengah dan Tinggi Provinsi DKI Jakarta.Dalam gugatannya, Yustina meminta majelis hakim menyatakan keputusan para tergugat bahwa anak penggugat berinisial BB tidak berhak melanjutkan proses belajar ke jenjang kelas 12 SMA Kolese Gonzaga adalah cacat hukum.Yustina meminta majelis hakim menyatakan BB memenuhi syarat dan berhak untuk melanjutkan proses belajar ke kelas 12 SMA Kolese Gonzaga.Selain itu, Yustina juga meminta majelis hakim menghukum para tergugat untuk membayar ganti rugi secara tanggung renteng kepadanya. Ganti rugi itu meliputi materil Rp51.683.000 dan imateril Rp500 juta.Terkait kasus ini, Â Dinas Pendidikan DKI Jakarta mengaku sudah mencoba memediasi Yustina dengan pihak SMA Gonzaga. Namun upaya mediasi ditolak pihak sekolah yang justru memilih mediasi dilakukan di pengadilan.Kepala Seksi Peserta Didik dan Pengembangan Karakter Peserta Disdik DKI Jakarta, Taga Radja Gah menjelaskan dalih SMA Gonzaga di balik penolakan mediasi di kantor Dinas Pendidikan DKI karena pihak sekolah takut gugatan tetap dilayangkan meskipun sudah mediasi.(fey/ugo)

South Jakarta District Court Holds Trial of Parents' Students Sues Gonzaga High School Today
Nov 04 2019, 06:32 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Istockphoto / Marilyn Nieves)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The suit of Yustina Supatmi, a parent of a student who sued a teacher because of his disappointment that his child did not go up to the Gonzaga College High School, West Pejaten, South Jakarta, will be held this morning, Monday (4/11) at the South Jakarta District Court. South Jakarta District Public Relations PR Achmad Guntur said the trial agenda with case number 833 / Pdt.G / 2019 / PNJKT.SEL was the summoning of the defendant to attend the hearing. "At 10.00 WIB. The event was still calling the [defendant] party because the previous trial was absent, "Achmad said via a short message to CNNIndonesia.com, Sunday (3/11). Previously the first session had been held on Monday (28/10). However, the trial was adjourned because the defendant was absent. Yustina sued Gonzaga College High School Principal Paulus Andri Astanto, Deputy Principal of the Curriculum Field Himawan Santanu, Deputy Principal of Student Affairs Gerardus Hadian Panamokta, and Class XI Sociology teacher Agus Dewa Irianto.In addition, Yustina Yustina also sued the Head of DKI Jakarta Provincial Secondary and Higher Education Office. In his lawsuit, Yustina asked the panel of judges to state that the defendant's decision that the plaintiff's child with the initials BB was not entitled to continue the learning process at the 12th grade of Gonzaga College High School was a legal flaw. qualify and have the right to continue the process of studying to the 12th grade of Gonzaga College High School. In addition, Yustina also asked the panel of judges to punish the defendants to pay compensation jointly to him. The compensation included material Rp. 51,683,000 and immaterial Rp. 500 million. Regarding this case, the DKI Jakarta Education Agency claimed to have tried to mediate Yustina with Gonzaga High School. However, the mediation effort was rejected by the school which chose mediation instead in the court. Head of the Student Section and Character Development of DKI Jakarta Disdik Participants, Taga Radja Gah explained the pretext of Gonzaga High School behind the refusal of mediation in the DKI Education Office because the school was afraid of the lawsuit still being filed even though already mediated.
